page.description: Remove the user from the group in the currently connected database or server.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = DropUserFromGroup(UserName as C, GroupName as C)

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

page.discussion: The DropUserFromGroup() method removes the user from the group in the currently connected database or server.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='SQLServer', Server='doc3000', Trusted_connection=yes, Database='Northwind'}" conn.open(connString) conn.DropUserToGroup("Edward", "Techwriting")
